Name: Goblin
Description: Small but nasty creature who attacks all travelers

Name: Orc
Description: Big but slow enemy that hits hard

Name: Dark Elf
Description: Not the good kind thats for sure. These elves have a high health pool and deal a normal amount of damage

Name: Mimic
Description: Looks like a treasure chest but you definitely don't want what's inside. High attack low hp.

Name: Dragon
Description: An ancient black dragon - huge and dangerous. We won't ask how he is related to the Dragonborn.
